name: Rattok
description: The Rattok is a Small fiend with a chaotic appearance, featuring nimble movements and dark, shadowy forms.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate health rapidly and become immune to fire and necrotic damage makes it a unique threat.
goals: To engage in chaotic mischief and combat, using its abilities to gain an edge in battle.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other chaotic fiends or summoned by dark sorcerers.
environment: Commonly found in chaotic or fiend-influenced areas, often lurking in shadows.
strengths: Speed and skillful navigation make it a formidable opponent, along with multiple immunities and resistances.
weaknesses: Low Wisdom and Charisma attributes hinder its perception and social interactions.
attacks: It uses a combination of biting and clawing attacks, with necrotic damage dealing additional harm.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Rush unleashes shadowy clones that can damage multiple foes in a sweeping attack.
skills: Possesses a Stealth skill of +5, enhancing its ability to remain concealed.
additional_information: Immunities to fire, necrotic, and poison damage
Regains health through its Bottled Soul ability
Advantages on saving throws against magical effects
Resistance to cold and lightning damage
Ability to move freely in fire or necrotic environments
test_queries: swift fiend that can become immune to fire
shadowy creature with swift combat abilities
fiend that uses necrotic attacks and stealth
small mobile fiend with damage resistance
